animeTitle: Monkey Punch: Manga Katsudou Daishashin - Crime Mate Special
animeDescription: Miki and Naomi deal with biological weapons and arms dealer Ramon. Some characters from Mankatsu as well as the 4 central characters from Lupin III can be seen in the background at times.
animeRelated: ['Character: Lupin III', 'Parent story: Monkey Punch: Manga Katsudou Daishashin']
